lore: The Angels were created by the deities of light at the time when humans were taking their first steps in the world. They were the first warriors and fought against a dark power that threatened all existence at the dawn of creation.\n\nThe Angel Soulslayer is able to snatch the soul of its opponent for a few minutes, causing a feeling of emptiness and depersonalization that has led many of its opponents to commit suicide.
menagerieDialog: (It appears to be calm, but you know a terrifying spectacle awaits its enemies.)
(This creature radiates an aura of violence. Perfect for decimating your foes.)
(You can tell it feels restless. Perhaps it knows a battle is coming.)
(This is perhaps the most serious and focused creature you've ever encountered. It will serve you well in battle.)
(It meets your gaze with a firm, confident, and yet obedient stare. This creature is well-suited for battle.)
name: Angel Soulslayer
